name: Light Blue
description:
In a 'different' world, filled with vibrant colors and pixelated images, there is a girl named Bluey. Bluey is blue, literally. You go on 5 dates with this girl and having new experiences.

A small and simple visual novel about a girl in blue, and the world that she lives in.

Notes:
- If browser going nuts, you can download the game
- Don't click the dialogue too fast because it might crash
- If your game crashes, try restarting the app/browser
- You can go back to main menu via "Esc"

Credits:

Art: My Busted Brain
Programming: My Decrepit Body & My Busted Brain
Voice Acting: My Scuffed Throat
Background Music and SFX:
